answerText: "The Knight's Tale" [10] "The Knight's Tale" is the first of the Canterbury Tales, which was written by this English author of Parliament of Fowls and The Legend of Good Women.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | UC Irvine and Michigan State A | 5 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Perotheus petitions for the freedom of one character while the other character escapes from Theseus's prison, and they eventually meet in the forest before it is decided that they will fight in fifty weeks' time.  [10] Name this story in which Palamon and Emelye go through grieving after the death of Arcite before getting married, the first of its collection.
